name: ghostsurf
description: GhostSurf privacy browser with multi-profile support and proxy isolation

tools.name: ghostsurf_status
tools.description: Get current browser status including active profile, open tabs, and available profiles

tools.name: ghostsurf_list_profiles
tools.description: List all browser profiles with their configurations (proxy, user agent, privacy settings)

tools.name: ghostsurf_list_tabs
tools.description: List all open browser tabs with their URLs and titles

tools.name: ghostsurf_snapshot
tools.description: Get a snapshot of the current browser state (active profile, all tabs, active tab index)

tools.name: ghostsurf_navigate
tools.description: Navigate the current or specified tab to a URL

tools.name: ghostsurf_create_tab
tools.description: Open a new browser tab, optionally with a specific URL

url.description: URL to open in the new tab

tools.name: ghostsurf_close_tab
tools.description: Close a browser tab by index

index.description: Index of the tab to close

tools.name: ghostsurf_switch_profile
tools.description: Switch to a different browser profile (changes proxy, user agent, cookies, storage)

profile_id.description: ID of the profile to switch to

tools.name: ghostsurf_create_profile
tools.description: Create a new browser profile with custom settings

tools.name: ghostsurf_delete_profile
tools.description: Delete a browser profile by ID
